name: Custom Redirection after Add to Cart for Woo Stores
author: Enweby

sections.description:
This plugin enables woocommerce store owner to set redirection after customer adds product to cart. Once redirection is set through admin, customer will be redirected to checkout or any specific page set in the admin settings.

Plugin is easy to use with no complicated setup or settings. Plugin’s settings can be changed right on woocommerce settings page.

Add to cart redirect plugin is very lightweiht and supports almost all popular themes.

Custom Redirection options

👉 Checkout page

  • When this option is selected, user will be redirected to woocomerce checkout page after product is added to checkout page so that user can place order quickly.

👉 Cart page

  • When this option is selected on custom redirection after add to cart plugin, user be redirected to cart page.

👉 Account page

  • Using this option customer can be redirected to woocommerce account page

👉 Any wordpress page

  • When this option is selected user will be redirected to any wordpress page which is selected in the woocommerce settngs page.

Plugin Information

  • Plugin Site
  • Plugin Documentation
  • Get Support
  • Free Plugins on WordPress.org
  • More Free & Premium Plugins
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

AUTOMATIC INSTALLATION (EASIEST WAY)

To do an automatic install of ‘Enweby Custom Redirection after Add to Cart’, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.
In the search field type ‘Enweby Custom Redirection after Add to Cart’ by Enweby.
Once you have found it, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now” and then “Activate”.

MANUAL INSTALLATION

Installing through WordPress Dashboard

  • Download enweby-custom-redirection-after-add-to-cart.zip
  • Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  • Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  • Select enweby-custom-redirection-after-add-to-cart.zip from your computer
  • Click ‘Install Now’
  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  • Download enweby-custom-redirection-after-add-to-cart.zip
  • Extract the enweby-custom-redirection-after-add-to-cart.zip to your computer
  • Upload the enweby-custom-redirection-after-add-to-cart directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
Q. Where are this plugin’s Settings located?

A. After activating the plugin, you can click on settings link under the plugin or on go to woocommerce settings and select page of where you want to redirect.

Q. I have a question about the plugin where should I contact?

A. Since this is a free plugin, please ask all questions on the support forum here on WordPress.org. We will try to respond to every question within 48 hours.

Q. How can I request a feature or encourage future development?

A. Free plugins rely on user feedback, therefore, the best thing you can do for us is to leave a review to encourage others to try the plugin. The more users, the more likely newer features will be added. That’s a very small thing to ask for in exchange for a FREE plugin. If you require any customizations, you can contact our support. Support link is given above in description.
